text: Stall moor row cairn at Stalldown Barrow Stalldown Barrow, sometimes called Staldon, is a megalithic site in Devon, about 5 km from Harford. It consists of a long stone row. It is fairly close to the stone circle on Stall Moor. * Category:History of Devon Category:Barrows in the United Kingdom Category:Archaeological sites in Devon Category:Megalithic monuments in England Category:Bronze Age sites in Devon
title: Stalldown Barrow
